updateTips.default:
v5.2 Change Log: Added: Option to set own Avatar in Text messages (Have to choose manually in UWTE). Option to add New Conversation FAB(Floating Action Button) in Chats Tab.
Updated: App BG Image chooser to use built in gallery instead of a custom file manager. App BG to support Starred Messages activity.
Fixed: Contact avatar size. Now it should not look too big or too small.
